Text: SI Server will be UNAVAILABLE TODAY Wednesday July Bill NonPrivilegedpst URGENT NOTIFICATION SI Server will be UNAVAILABLE TODAY Wednesday July to pdt to Perform a Fallback to our backup SI server in Alhambra Please submit all Hour Ahead schedules for July th HE and and Supplemental Energy schedules for and prior to Once the fallback is complete and the SI system is available Please clear your memory and disk caches Edit Preferences Advanced Cache close all Netscape windows including messages Restart Netscape and point your browsers to our Backup server by utilizing the following URL iso This Fallback will allow us to minimize potential interruption due to Electrical work being performed at the Folsom facility We expect to utilize the server in Alhambra until Monday through the publishing of the DA Final Schedules pst after which we plan to FallForward back to Folsom We will provide additional notification to you on Monday Please contact Ginger Seitles or Benik DerGevorgian if you have any questions or concerns Thank you ISO Market Operations
